attractions.title: Gyeongbokgung Palace
attractions.description: The largest of the Five Grand Palaces built by the Joseon Dynasty, offering a glimpse into royal history with changing of the guard ceremony.

attractions.title: Namsan Seoul Tower
attractions.description: Iconic tower with panoramic views of Seoul, cable car access, and love locks tradition.

attractions.title: Myeongdong Shopping Street
attractions.description: Vibrant district for K-beauty, street food, and fashion shopping.

attractions.title: Bukchon Hanok Village
attractions.description: Traditional Korean houses (hanok) preserved in a historic neighborhood.

attractions.title: Insadong Cultural Street
attractions.description: Art galleries, tea houses, and traditional crafts in a charming alley.

attractions.title: Incheon Chinatown
attractions.description: Korea's only official Chinatown with jjajangmyeon noodles and colorful architecture.

attractions.title: Songdo Central Park
attractions.description: Modern urban park with floating gardens and yacht marina.

attractions.title: Wolmi Theme Park
attractions.description: Family-friendly park with rides, beach, and historical sites near the airport.

attractions.title: Cheongju National Museum
attractions.description: Exhibits on ancient artifacts and Chungcheong region's history.

attractions.title: Sukjipgongwon Park
attractions.description: Scenic park with cherry blossoms and traditional gardens.

attractions.title: Hyanggyo Confucian School
attractions.description: Oldest Confucian academy in Korea, showcasing Joseon education.

attractions.title: Sejong Lake Park
attractions.description: Eco-friendly lake with walking trails and modern art installations.

attractions.title: National Assembly of Korea
attractions.description: Futuristic parliament building with guided tours.

attractions.title: Hwaseong Fortress
attractions.description: UNESCO site with massive walls, gates, and archery experience.

attractions.title: Suwon Chicken Street
attractions.description: Famous for spicy fried chicken and local eats.

attractions.title: Gyeongpo Beach
attractions.description: Popular summer beach with pine trees and nearby lake.

attractions.title: Ojukheon
attractions.description: Birthplace of King Seongjong and poet Shin Saimdang.

attractions.title: Hahoe Folk Village
attractions.description: UNESCO-listed traditional village with mask dance festival.

attractions.title: Andong Jjimdak Street
attractions.description: Braised chicken dish specialty in a lively street.

attractions.title: Gongsanseong Fortress
attractions.description: Ancient Baekje fortress with panoramic views.

attractions.title: Tomb of King Muryeong
attractions.description: Well-preserved Baekje royal tomb with artifacts.

attractions.title: Daecheon Beach
attractions.description: Long sandy beach famous for mud festival in summer.

attractions.title: Boryeong Mud Experience
attractions.description: Annual mud flat activities and spa.

attractions.title: Donghwasa Temple
attractions.description: Mountain temple with giant Buddha statue.

attractions.title: Seomun Market
attractions.description: Traditional market for street food and textiles.

attractions.title: E-World Amusement Park
attractions.description: Theme park with rides and 83 Tower.

attractions.title: Bongjeongam Hermitage
attractions.description: Ancient hermitage with natural hot springs nearby.

attractions.title: Pohang Steel Yard
attractions.description: Modern tour of POSCO steel mill.

attractions.title: Bulguksa Temple
attractions.description: UNESCO Silla kingdom temple with stone pagodas.

attractions.title: Seokguram Grotto
attractions.description: Buddhist cave with granite Buddha statue.

attractions.title: Gyeongju National Museum
attractions.description: Artifacts from Silla era, including divine bell.

attractions.title: Jeonju Hanok Village
attractions.description: 800+ traditional hanok houses with cultural experiences.

attractions.title: Omokdae Pavilion
attractions.description: Hilltop view of the hanok village.

attractions.title: Gyeonggijeon Shrine
attractions.description: Portrait of King Taejo in a Joseon-era hall.

attractions.title: Daewangam Park
attractions.description: Coastal park with volcanic rock formations and lighthouse.

attractions.title: Jangsaengpo Whale Museum
attractions.description: History of whaling with life-size models.

attractions.title: Haeundae Beach
attractions.description: Bustling beach with summer festivals and skyscrapers.

attractions.title: Gamcheon Culture Village
attractions.description: Colorful hillside village like a mini Santorini.

attractions.title: Jagalchi Fish Market
attractions.description: Largest seafood market with fresh sashimi.

attractions.title: Yongdusan Park & Busan Tower
attractions.description: City views from the 120m tower.

attractions.title: Dongpirang Village
attractions.description: Art-filled hillside with murals and sea views.

attractions.title: Mireuksan Cable Car
attractions.description: Ride over islands and bridges.

attractions.title: The Big O Show
attractions.description: Nighttime light and water spectacle on the bridge.

attractions.title: Odongdo Island
attractions.description: Camellia gardens and migratory birds.

attractions.title: Yudal Mountain
attractions.description: Hiking trails with sunset views over the sea.

attractions.title: Gohun-sa Temple
attractions.description: Seaside temple with unique rock formations.

foods.title: Bibimbap at Tosokchon
foods.description: Mixed rice with vegetables, meat, and gochujang sauce—try the ginseng chicken version for energy boost.

foods.title: Tteokbokki Street Food in Myeongdong
foods.description: Spicy rice cakes with fish cakes—iconic K-street snack, customizable heat level.

foods.title: Korean BBQ at Maple Tree House
foods.description: Grilled marinated beef (galbi) with banchan sides—perfect for groups.

foods.title: Halal Korean Fried Chicken in Itaewon
foods.description: Crispy halal-certified chicken with soy garlic sauce—Muslim-friendly twist on KFC.

foods.title: Hotteok Pancakes in Insadong
foods.description: Sweet filled pancakes with brown sugar and nuts—winter favorite.

foods.title: Jjajangmyeon at Chinatown
foods.description: Black bean noodles—Korea's take on Chinese noodles, hearty and savory.

foods.title: Jopokbal in Chinatown
foods.description: Steamed pig's feet with soy sauce—tender and addictive.

foods.title: Seafood Pancakes at Songdo
foods.description: Crispy pancakes with fresh squid and green onions.

foods.title: Sundubu Jjigae
foods.description: Spicy soft tofu stew with seafood—comfort food classic.

foods.title: Bindaetteok Pancakes
foods.description: Mung bean pancakes with pork—crispy and nutty.

foods.title: Galbi Tang Soup
foods.description: Beef short rib soup with clear broth—warming and flavorful.

foods.title: Suwon Chicken Street
foods.description: Spicy fried or steamed chicken—local specialty with unique sauce.

foods.title: Kongnamul Gukbap
foods.description: Soybean sprout soup with rice—simple and healthy.

foods.title: Sundae Guk
foods.description: Blood sausage soup with noodles—east coast winter warmer.

foods.title: Hwangtae Hoe
foods.description: Dried pollack sashimi—fresh seafood from the east sea.

foods.title: Andong Jjimdak
foods.description: Braised chicken with glass noodles—signature dish of Andong.

foods.title: Heotjesabap
foods.description: Raw beef over rice with vegetables—delicate and fresh.

foods.title: Beotkku Guksu
foods.description: Wheat noodles in beef broth—light and comforting.

foods.title: Baekje Braised Dishes
foods.description: Traditional Baekje-style braised meats and veggies.

foods.title: Mud Festival Seafood BBQ
foods.description: Grilled clams and squid during mud fest—fresh from the beach.

foods.title: Boryeong Hangover Soup
foods.description: Haejangguk with rice cake—post-festival cure.

foods.title: Makguksu Noodles
foods.description: Buckwheat noodles in cold broth—summer specialty.

foods.title: Eomuk Tang
foods.description: Fish cake soup—street vendor favorite.

foods.title: Jjimdak in Seomun Market
foods.description: Braised chicken similar to Andong style.

foods.title: Raw Fish (Hwe)
foods.description: Fresh sashimi from the fish market—super fresh cuts.

foods.title: Millmyeon Cold Noodles
foods.description: Spicy cold wheat noodles—cooling for hot summers.

foods.title: Gyeongju Bread
foods.description: Sweet red bean bun—UNESCO intangible heritage snack.

foods.title: Kongbok Rice Cake
foods.description: Sticky rice cakes with honey—traditional sweet.

foods.title: Silla-Style Royal Cuisine
foods.description: Reconstructed ancient Silla meals with multiple banchan.

foods.title: Bibimbap at Jeonju
foods.description: Colorful vegetable bibimbap—UNESCO food heritage.

foods.title: Kongnamul Gukbap
foods.description: Soybean sprout soup with rice—light Jeonju classic.

foods.title: Makgeolli at Nambu Market
foods.description: Rice wine tasting with fresh pancakes.

foods.title: Haejangguk Soup
foods.description: Hangover soup with pork and cabbage.

foods.title: Whale Meat BBQ
foods.description: Grilled whale (ethical sourcing)—unique coastal delicacy.

foods.title: Ssiat Hotteok
foods.description: Seed-filled sweet pancakes—Gukje Market specialty.

foods.title: Milmyeon in Haeundae
foods.description: Cold spicy noodles—refreshing Busan summer dish.

foods.title: Dwaeji Gukbap
foods.description: Pork rice soup— hearty port city staple.

foods.title: Sashimi at Jagalchi
foods.description: Fresh raw fish straight from the auction.

foods.title: Tongyeong Fish Cake Soup
foods.description: Eomuk guk with local seafood.

foods.title: Seaweed Soup
foods.description: Miyeok guk with island-fresh seaweed.

foods.title: Yeosu Grilled Mackerel
foods.description: Fresh grilled fish with sea views.

foods.title: Black Pork BBQ
foods.description: Jeju-style black pork grilled.

foods.title: Gyodong Fishcake
foods.description: Handmade fish cakes on skewers.

foods.title: Mokpo Octopus Stir-Fry
foods.description: Nakalchi bokkeum—spicy octopus dish.

transportations.title: Incheon Airport → Seoul AREX Express Train
transportations.description: Fastest non-stop train from Incheon Airport Terminal 1 & 2 to Seoul Station in 43–51 min.

transportations.title: Airport Limousine Bus #6701 (Incheon → Myeongdong)
transportations.description: Deluxe bus directly to Myeongdong, Lotte Hotel, and major hotels.

transportations.title: Kakao T Black / Uber Black (Premium Taxi)
transportations.description: Luxury van taxi from Incheon Airport to anywhere in Seoul (fixed rate).

transportations.title: Seoul Subway Line 1–9 Full Network
transportations.description: Extensive subway system covering all major districts, 24/7 some lines.

transportations.title: KTX Seoul Station → Busan (High-Speed Rail)
transportations.description: KTX from Seoul Station or Suseo SRT to Busan in 2h 15min.

transportations.title: AREX All-Stop Train (Airport Railroad)
transportations.description: Budget train stopping at all 12 stations from airport to Seoul Station.

transportations.title: Incheon Airport Maglev Train
transportations.description: Free magnetic levitation train inside airport area to long-term parking & Yongyu.

transportations.title: International Ferry Terminal → Wolmido
transportations.description: Ferry to nearby islands and cruise to China routes.

transportations.title: Cheongju International Airport → City Bus
transportations.description: Direct bus #747 to Cheongju city center and intercity terminal.

transportations.title: Cheongju Intercity Bus Terminal → Seoul Express
transportations.description: Frequent express buses to Seoul Gangnam (1h 40min).

transportations.title: Sejong BRT (BRT Red Line)
transportations.description: Fast red BRT buses connecting government complex to Osong KTX Station.

transportations.title: Suwon Station KTX (to Busan/Seoul)
transportations.description: KTX stop on Gyeongbu Line, 30 min to Seoul, 2h to Busan.

transportations.title: Shinbundang Line (Gangnam → Gwanggyo)
transportations.description: Fast red subway line connecting Gangnam to Suwon Gwanggyo.

transportations.title: KTX Gangneung Line (Seoul → Gangneung)
transportations.description: KTX from Seoul Station or Cheongnyangni to Gangneung in 1h 50min.

transportations.title: Gangneung City Tour Bus (Beach & Coffee Street)
transportations.description: Hop-on hop-off bus covering Anmok Coffee Street, Jeongdongjin, Ojukheon.

transportations.title: Andong Station → Hahoe Village Bus #46
transportations.description: Direct bus from Andong Station to UNESCO Hahoe Folk Village.

transportations.title: Express Bus Andong → Seoul Gangnam
transportations.description: Premium express bus to Seoul in 2h 50min.

transportations.title: Gongju Intercity Bus Terminal → Seoul Nambu
transportations.description: Frequent buses to Seoul Nambu Terminal.

transportations.title: KTX Osong Station → Gongju Shuttle Bus
transportations.description: Free shuttle from Osong KTX to Gongju city (30 min).

transportations.title: KTX → Daejeon Station → Boryeong Bus
transportations.description: Express bus from Daejeon to Boryeong (Daechon Beach) in 1h 30min.

transportations.title: Seoul → Daechon Direct Express Bus
transportations.description: Direct summer weekend bus from Seoul to Daechon Beach.

transportations.title: Daegu Metro Line 1–3
transportations.description: Three subway lines covering downtown, Dongdaegu KTX, and Seomun Market.

transportations.title: Dongdaegu Station KTX
transportations.description: Major KTX hub connecting Seoul (1h 40min), Busan (40 min).

transportations.title: Daegu City Tour Bus (Red/Green Line)
transportations.description: Hop-on hop-off covering Dongseong-ro, herb hills, E-World.

transportations.title: Pohang KTX (Donghae Line)
transportations.description: KTX from Seoul to Pohang in 2h 10min.

transportations.title: Pohang → Guryongpo Local Bus
transportations.description: Bus to famous Guryongpo seafood market and peninsula.

transportations.title: Gyeongju Station → Downtown Bus #10/11
transportations.description: Direct bus to Gyeongju city center, Bulguksa, and Bomun Lake.

transportations.title: Gyeongju City Tour Bus (Blue/Red Line)
transportations.description: Hop-on hop-off covering Bulguksa, Seokguram, Anapji, Cheomseongdae.

transportations.title: Singo KTX Station (Gyeongbu Line)
transportations.description: New KTX station 20 min from downtown (shuttle available).

transportations.title: Jeonju Intercity Bus Terminal → Seoul
transportations.description: Frequent buses to Seoul Gangnam (2h 50min).

transportations.title: Jeonju Hanok Village Shuttle Bus
transportations.description: Circular bus around Hanok Village, Nambu Market, and Gyeonggijeon.

transportations.title: KTX Jeonju Station (Honam Line)
transportations.description: KTX from Yongsan/Seoul to Jeonju in 1h 50min.

transportations.title: Ulsan KTX Station (Donghae Line)
transportations.description: KTX from Seoul to Ulsan in 2h 10min.

transportations.title: Express Bus Ulsan → Seoul
transportations.description: Premium buses to Seoul Gangnam.

transportations.title: KTX Busan Station
transportations.description: Main KTX terminal, Seoul to Busan in 2h 15min.

transportations.title: Busan Metro Line 1–4 + BGL
transportations.description: Four subway lines + Busan–Gimhae Light Rail to airport.

transportations.title: Busan City Tour Bus (Red/Blue/Green)
transportations.description: Three hop-on hop-off routes covering Haeundae, Taejongdae, Gamcheon.

transportations.title: Gimhae Airport → Haeundae Limousine Bus
transportations.description: Direct deluxe bus from Gimhae Airport to Haeundae Beach.

transportations.title: Tongyeong Intercity Bus Terminal → Busan
transportations.description: Frequent buses to Busan Seobu Terminal (1h 30min).

transportations.title: Tongyeong Port → Hallyeosudo Cable Car Ferry
transportations.description: Ferry to Mireuksan Island (cable car) and outer islands.

transportations.title: Yeosu Expo KTX Station
transportations.description: KTX from Seoul/Yongsan to Yeosu Expo in 3h 10min.

transportations.title: Yeosu Port → Odongdo Ferry
transportations.description: Frequent ferry to famous Odongdo Island (camellia).

transportations.title: Mokpo KTX Station (Honam Line)
transportations.description: KTX from Yongsan to Mokpo in 2h 20min.

transportations.title: Mokpo Port → Jeju High-Speed Ferry
transportations.description: Daily high-speed ferry to Jeju Island (Santa Monica, Seaworld Express).

itineraries.title: Best of Seoul in 7 Days – First Timer Classic
itineraries.description: The ultimate week-long itinerary: palaces, villages markets Han River K-beauty night views.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Arrival Myeongdong N Seoul Tower
Day 2: Gyeongbokgung (hanbok) Bukchon Insadong
Day 3: Changdeokgung Secret Garden Jongmyo
Day 4: DMZ Tour Hongdae night
Day 5: Gangnam COEX Starfield Bongeunsa
Day 6: Han River cruise Itaewon Dongdaemun
Day 7: Namsan Hanok Namdaemun Departure

itineraries.title: Seoul Highlights in 5 Days
itineraries.description: Perfect mid-length trip for busy travelers.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Arrival Myeongdong night market
Day 2: Gyeongbokgung Bukchon Insadong
Day 3: Changdeokgung Hongdae street performances
Day 4: Gangnam COEX Lotte World Tower
Day 5: N Seoul Tower shopping departure

itineraries.title: Seoul Weekend Escape 3 Days
itineraries.description: Friday night to Sunday – ideal for short holiday.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1 (Fri): Arrival Hongdae night life
Day 2 (Sat): Gyeongbokgung Insadong Myeongdong
Day 3 (Sun): N Seoul Tower Gangnam departure

itineraries.title: Seoul K-Pop & Idol Fan 4 Days
itineraries.description: Music shows, company buildings, dance classes, idol cafes.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: SMTOWN HYBE Insight
Day 2: Music shows (pre-record) Hongdae busking
Day 3: Dance academy + Gangnam idol shops
Day 4: K-Star Road shopping departure

itineraries.title: Seoul Luxury & Michelin 5 Days
itineraries.description: 5-star hotels, 3-Michelin-star dining, private tours.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Four Seasons check-in Myeongdong shopping
Day 2: Private palace tour Jungsik dinner
Day 3: Gangnam luxury street spa day
Day 4: Han River private yacht Lotte Tower
Day 5: Duty-free departure

itineraries.title: Incheon Long Layover 2 Days 1 Night
itineraries.description: Best 40-hour+ layover plan with free transit hotel possible.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: ICN → Paradise City/Wonderbox → Chinatown dinner
Day 2: Songdo Central Park → Wolmido → back to airport

itineraries.title: Incheon Islands & Beach 4 Days
itineraries.description: Ganghwa, Muui, Eurwangni beaches & history.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Chinatown & Wolmido
Day 2: Ganghwa Island UNESCO dolmens
Day 3: Muui-do beach
Day 4: Eurwangni sunset → departure

itineraries.title: Songdo Smart City 3 Days
itineraries.description: Futuristic city experience with canal walks and modern architecture.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Central Park boat
Day 2: G-Tower, Canal Walk
Day 3: Hyundai Outlet → departure

itineraries.title: Cheongju Cultural Weekend 3 Days
itineraries.description: Jikji, fortress, makgeolli, presidential villa.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Cheongnamdae
Day 2: Sangdang Fortress + Jikji Museum
Day 3: Local market + departure

itineraries.title: Cheongju Quick Stop 2 Days
itineraries.description: Ideal when passing through central Korea.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Jikji Museum + Sangdang Sanseong
Day 2: Cheongju National Museum → departure

itineraries.title: Sejong Government City & Nature 2 Days
itineraries.description: Modern administrative capital + lake park.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Government Complex tour + Lake Park
Day 2: Geumgang River bike → departure

itineraries.title: Suwon Hwaseong Fortress 2 Days
itineraries.description: UNESCO fortress, Korean Folk Village, chicken street.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Hwaseong Fortress wall walk + night light-up
Day 2: Korean Folk Village → Suwon chicken street

itineraries.title: Suwon 1-Day Trip from Seoul
itineraries.description: Easy day trip from Seoul by subway/KTX.
itineraries.day_detail: Morning: Hwaseong Fortress → Lunch chicken street → Afternoon Folk Village → Evening back to Seoul

itineraries.title: Gangneung Beach & Coffee 4 Days
itineraries.description: Anmok Coffee Street, beaches, pine forest, terrace cafes.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Jeongdongjin sunrise + Coffee Street
Day 2: Gyeongpo Beach + lake
Day 3: Ojukheon + pine forest
Day 4: Haslla Art World → departure

itineraries.title: Gangneung Winter Surf & Snow 5 Days
itineraries.description: Surfing in winter + nearby ski resorts.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1–2: Surfing + Coffee Street
Day 3–4: High1 or Yongpyong ski day trip
Day 5: Departure

itineraries.title: Andong Hahoe Village 3 Days
itineraries.description: UNESCO Hahoe Folk Village + mask festival + jjimdak.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Hahoe Village stay in hanok
Day 2: Mask museum + traditional performance
Day 3: Andong jjimdak street → departure

itineraries.title: Andong 2-Day Cultural Escape
itineraries.description: Quick but deep cultural experience.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Hahoe Village + mask dance
Day 2: Dosan Seowon → departure

itineraries.title: Gongju Baekje History 2 Days
itineraries.description: Tomb of King Muryeong, Gongsanseong Fortress.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Royal Tombs + National Museum
Day 2: Gongsanseong Fortress → departure

itineraries.title: Gongju & Buyeo Baekje 3 Days
itineraries.description: Combine two Baekje capitals.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Gongju tombs & fortress
Day 2: Move to Buyeo → Busosanseong
Day 3: Nakhwaam Rock → departure

itineraries.title: Daechon Mud Festival 4 Days (July only)
itineraries.description: World famous Boryeong Mud Festival + beach.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1–3: Mud slides, mud prison, concerts
Day 4: Relax on beach → departure

itineraries.title: Daechon Beach Weekend 3 Days
itineraries.description: Summer beach getaway from Seoul.
itineraries.day_detail:
Day 1: Arrive & beach
Day 2: Water sports & seafood
Day 3: Sunrise & departure

itineraries.title: Daegu City & Fashion 4 Days
